next.excerpt: Trexy allows you to track your own expenses. You can also track lending and borrowing records between your family and friends. Multi-currency comes in handy regardless of which currency you spend on. Expenses are grouped by category in monthly pie-chart.
next.title: Trexy - Track expenses and debts easily with multi-currency support.

localize.description: Trexy允许你跟踪自己的支出。您还可以追踪家人和朋友之间的借贷记录。无论你用哪种货币消费，多币种都很方便。在每月的饼状图中，支出按类别进行分组。
localize.tagline: 支持多种货币，轻松追踪费用和债务。

localize.description: Trexy允許你跟蹤自己的支出。您還可以追蹤家人和朋友之間的借貸記錄。無論你用哪種貨幣消費，多幣種都很方便。在每月的餅狀圖中，支出按類別進行分組。
localize.tagline: 支持多種貨幣，輕鬆追蹤費用和債務。
